titles.title: A resolution congratulating Michael Campbell for his victory in the U.S. Open golf tournament and celebrating the relationship between the United States and New Zealand.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 7/1/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Commends Michael Campbell of New Zealand for winning the U.S. Open golf tournament. Recognizes the victory as an opportunity to highlight the strong relationship and foster greater collaboration and friendship between the United States and New Zealand. Expresses arohanui to the peoples of Aotearoa, our friends in the Land of the Long White Cloud.
